name: Better Me Book [Digital Diary and Self Help Platform]
name_original: Better Me Book [Digital Diary and Self Help Platform]
description:
What is Better Me Book?:

Better Me Book is a private journal and self development platform that provides a personal space to post your daily progress, reflect on your goals, work on personal self improvements while encouraging your own daily, weekly and monthly progress. Better Me Book also provides access to "self help" development applications that are easy to learn and can be completed daily. *Better Me Book is an online platform that can be accessed from any web browser and any device that supports a web browser (PC/TABLET/SMART TV). https://www.bettermebook.com

What Can I Do on Better Me Book?:

You can post daily journals that are only visible and accessed by you, or post in your profile book. You can make your profile page totally private or available for friends to view. Although we have community events and optional group discussions, Better Me Book is designed and intended to be a personal and private experience. Most of your interactions will be private and for your own personal reflection and development.

What do I receive with Better Me Book?:

✔️ Lifetime access to the Better Me Book platform & unlimited access to your personal book (account). *You will be able to create one account using the application download.

✔️ Full access to write unlimited journals and full access to our community, groups, activities and events.

✔️ Gain experience points and level up your progress badge as you post content to your book.

✔️ Update your book with goals, reminders, words of inspiration and more.

✔️ You will receive full access to 2 self help applications, Better Me Boot Camp and Better Me Tree at no additional cost (coming soon).
